title: Inside secret Los Angeles sex parties for rich and powerful only where randy guests pay £1,500-a-night
text:
Glamorous sex parties filled with lingerie-wearing guests and intimate 'shows' are charging men £1,500-a-night to attend. 
And members of the Snctm sex club in Los Angeles - who sign a 'blood oath' to join - are splashing out an eye-watering £60,000-a-year for access to special rooms and privileges at the orgies. 
Men are charged £1,500 to attend a night or £1,200 if they bring a female partner, which women can attend for free but are vetted beforehand. 
New York Post reporter Heather Hauswirth gained access to one of the parties and described how leather clad models and actresses wearing masks and badges with cheeky messages strutted their stuff at the sexy bash. 
She was one of 99 guests who watched as two performances - a live threesome and a sexy fire-eating show - were staged. Read More (Photo: snctm/Vimeo) (Photo: snctm/Vimeo) 
She wrote: "Around us, a mostly female crowd of models, young professionals, actresses and assistants strut about in couture lingerie, much to the delight of older male guests in tuxedos. 
"One 20-something blonde crawls on the carpeted floor wearing red lace and a face mask with a leather pig snout and ears. 
"Other pretty young things wear metallic pasties and black badges that read 'Eat me' or 'Touch me' on their décolletage, while holding silver platters of bite-size brownies and parfaits. (Photo: snctm/Vimeo) 
"A man who calls himself the 'Bunnyman' and wears a black leather mask and rabbit ears demonstrates various Japanese bondage techniques on an aroused woman sitting upright in a plush, gold-painted chair." Read More 
Father of two Damon Lawner, 45, came up with the idea for the parties and founded Snctm in February 2013. (Photo: snctm/Vimeo)
